# intendedSpatialExperience

**Instance Property**

The spatial audio experience your app intends to provide the user.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc var intendedSpatialExperience: any AVAudioSessionSpatialExperience { get }
```

## Configuring the spatial experience in visionOS

- **setIntendedSpatialExperience(_:)**: Sets the spatial audio experience your app intends to provide the user.
- **AVAudioSessionSpatialExperience**
- **isNowPlayingCandidate**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the audio session is a candidate to be the Now Playing session.
- **setIsNowPlayingCandidate(_:)**: Sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the audio session is a candidate to be the Now Playing session.
